mapper.select: select m.pfimg,m.nick,o.id,od.productid,r.reviewid, r.star_score, r.contents, r.inputdate , LISTAGG(ri.review_img, ',') WITHIN GROUP(order by ri.reviewid) AS review_img from member m, orders o, order_detail od ,review r ,review_img ri where m.id=o.id(+) and o.orderid=od.orderid(+) and od.order_detailid = r.order_detailid(+) and r.reviewid=ri.reviewid(+) and od.productid=#{productid} group by m.pfimg,m.nick,o.id,od.productid,r.reviewid, r.star_score, r.contents, r.inputdate

select r.star_score, count(r.star_score) totalpeople from review r,order_detail od, product p where p.productid =od.productid and od.order_detailid=r.order_detailid and p.productid=#{p.productid} group by star_score
